pages.text: > $(n)Health:$() 10     $(br)> $(n)Attack Damage:$() 2, 3 on hard  $(br)> $(n)Behavior:$() Passive     $(br)> $(n)Spawn:$() Taigas, Grove    $(br)> $(n)Breeding:$() Sweet Berries, Glow Berries $(br)> $(n)Properties:$() $(br)Sleeps at day. Attack $(thing)Chickens$(), $(thing)Rabbits$(), $(thing)Baby Turtles$() & $(thing)Fish$(). Foxes can hold items in his mouth. Breeding two Foxes results in a tamed $(thing)Baby Fox$().
